item.title: Research
item.description: Research Broadly speaking, I am quite interested in discrete mathematics, especially number theory, combinatorics, and finite fields. For my PhD, I am currently working for some problems on matrices over sets of number theoretic interests. During my bachelor and master, I did a total of two final projects on some objects over finite fields. However, I am open for learning other topics. Publications Muhammad Afifurrahman. Some counting questions for matrix products, accepted to Bulletin of Australian Mathematical Society.

item.title: Education
item.description: Education PhD in Mathematics, University of New South Wales, Sydney, Australia (2022-present) Current thesis topic: Arithmetic statistics of matrices (over sets of number theoretic interests). Advisor: Alina Ostafe & Igor Shparlinski MSc in Mathematics, Institut Teknologi Bandung, Bandung, Indonesia (2020-2021) Thesis: Polynomial Parametrization for Some Classes of Maximum Sidon Sets over Finite Fields Advisor: Aleams Barra (also well-known for his YouTube channel) BSc in Mathematics, Institut Teknologi Bandung, Bandung, Indonesia (2016-2020)

item.title: Useful Links
item.description: Some links Here are my English and Indonesian blogs (infrequently updated). During pandemic, I often crash into some online mathematical research seminars from Research Seminars webpage. In fact, I first knew my (current) doctoral advisor because she organizes the Number Theory Web Seminar that is posted there. I like binge-reading mathematical blogs; in particular, Terence Tao’s and Igor Pak’s are worth reading. Also, I often lurk at TVTropes. (to be developed)
